workspace.name: elmer
workspace.description: AI-powered PM orchestrator that compresses discovery from weeks to days

product.name: elmer
product.one_liner: AI-powered PM orchestrator that compresses discovery from weeks to days so teams build the right thing the first time
product.description: A visual Kanban interface where moving a card triggers AI agents to execute PM work—from PRD generation to prototype creation to ticket handoff. Compress 6-week discovery cycles into 1 week.
product.target_market: Solo PMs and small PM teams at startups who need to validate faster and reduce engineering rework
anti_vision: Better notes tool - we're not competing with Notion for documentation
Static documentation system - docs without working prototypes are incomplete
Replacement for human judgment - AI accelerates, humans decide
Rigid waterfall enforcer - we embrace iteration, not linear flow
Enterprise complexity theater - minimal friction, maximum velocity
Feature factory accelerator - we compress discovery to validate, not to ship more junk

primary: Solo PM at startup (Maya) - validates faster, reduces rework
secondary: Engineering Lead (Raj) - wants clear specs from validated prototypes
Founder/CEO (Alex) - wants pipeline visibility and metric ties

outcomes.north_star: Time from idea to validated prototype (target: < 1 week)
key_metrics: Engineering rework rate (tickets reopened or features rebuilt)
User validation throughput (prototypes validated per week)
